short_description: This West African country may not be on many travelers' radar, but it offers a unique blend of culture, wildlife, and natural beauty. Visit the historic city of Agadez, go on a safari in the W National Park, and take a dip in the crystal-clear waters of the Goure Waterfalls

weather.title: Niger has a hot desert climate with extremely high temperatures year-round. It experiences very little rainfall, and temperatures can reach scorching levels, particularly in the summer months

when_to_visit.title: Dry season
when_to_visit.short_description: More comfortable temperatures with clear skies and limited rainfall. Note that desert areas will be coller at night

when_to_visit.title: Wet season
when_to_visit.short_description: Soaring temperatures and higher humidity, with a chance of thunderstorms

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Niger is during the cooler months of November to February when the temperatures are milder, and you can comfortably explore the country's national parks and cultural sites
